== Trivia ==
* The Japanese version of the soundtrack is sung by Mavuika'a Japanese voice actress, {{W|Mikako Komatsu|Komatsu Mikako ({{ja|小松未可子}})}}, herself, making this version the only one sung by any of Mavuika's voice actresses.
